document.full_text: the three major u.s. credit rating agencies won the dismissal of lawsuits seeking to hold them liable as "underwriters" for helping banks structure securities transactions to achieve desired ratings.
document.title: rating agencies win dismissal of lawsuits
lines_and_colors: the three major u.s. credit rating agencies won the dismissal of lawsuits seeking to hold them liable as "underwriters" for helping banks structure securities transactions to achieve desired ratings.
